about.title: About us
about.description: Welcome to Mobion store. Here you can find all electronics products. For more than 2 years, we have been engaged in choosing and advising the right gadget for our customers. Throughout our presence on the market, we have managed to optimize intercity delivery, so you will receive the gadget in three days, if you need delivery within the city, we will deliver the gadget in 2 hours. 90% of our customers become regular customers, because we guarantee a year. We work 7 days a week from 10:00 to 20:00. Visit us, we will always help you find the right gadget.

card1.title: What are the shipping methods?
card1.info: Delivery by courier is 30,000 soums. If the value of the order exceeds 490,000 soums, the courier service is free.

card2.title: Can the product be purchased online only?
card2.info: Of course not. You can come to Samarkand and buy in the store itself.

card3.title: How long will delivery take after ordering?
card3.info: In the city of Samarkand it will be delivered by courier ... day, to other regions ... day.

card4.title: How do we make the payment?
card4.info: Payment is made in the form of CLICK, PAYME or cash.

card5.title: Is your product quality?
card5.info: In the 'Mobion' store, you can see only original products.
